invariants.statement: χ defines a partial order on Box states (no χ-cycles in physical/semantic evolution).
invariants.formal: The χ-successor relation on states is acyclic for admissible histories.

invariants.statement: χ-evolution must preserve all upstream invariants at each step.
invariants.formal: If B satisfies all invariants up to Θ/Π, then χ(B) must also satisfy them, prior to Ω/ρ checks.
